member.name: MetadataBit
member.summary: Defines constants that are used to define the PropertyChainValue returned from XAML Diagnostics.

member.name: MetadataBit.IsValueHandle
member.summary: The value represents a string representation of an InstanceHandle.

member.name: MetadataBit.IsPropertyReadOnly
member.summary: The property is read only and cannot be set locally.

member.name: MetadataBit.IsValueCollection
member.summary: The value represents a collection object. (When set, IsValueHandle is also set.)

member.name: MetadataBit.IsValueCollectionReadOnly
member.summary: The value represents a read only collection.

member.name: MetadataBit.IsValueBindingExpression
member.summary: The value represents the evaluated value of a binding expression.

member.name: MetadataBit.IsValueNull
member.summary: The value is null. (Introduced in Windows 10, version 1607.)

member.name: MetadataBit.IsValueHandleAndEvaluatedValue
member.summary: The value represents a string representation of an InstanceHandle and an evaluated value. (Introduced in Windows 10, version 1607.)
